english.segment1: "To serve You Lord is a delight. And I just won't give up this fight. Lord I'll finish the race. Pressing toward the things above. As I'm covered in Your love. 'Till I see You face to face
english.segment2: CHORUS. You are my superstar. You are my superstar. I wanna be where You are. And I love you
english.segment3: To know You Lord is a delight. I worship You with all my might. You're the one I wanna chase. Pressing on toward the prize. My reflection in Your eyes. When I see You face to face
english.segment5: Jesus nothing compares. To what You've done in my life. And You are my one and only
english.segment6: You'll never leave me or forsake me. You're my friend 'till the end of time. You are my superstar
